trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> to and from other data types.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>與其他資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehaviorConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehaviorConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether or not conversion from a specified data type is possible.
trans-unit.target: 判斷可從指定的資料類型轉換。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> is the only supported type for conversion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>是唯一支援的型別轉換。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Context information required for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換所需的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Type to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 若要評估以進行轉換的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>if conversion is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>如果支援轉換。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines if conversion to a specified type is possible.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否可以轉換成指定型別。

trans-unit.source: The only supported destination types are <xref:System.String> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 唯一支援的目的型別會<xref:System.String>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Context information required for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換所需的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Destination type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 正在評估以進行轉換的目的地類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if conversion is possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>轉換是盡可能;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts a given string value to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehaviorConverter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字串值轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehaviorConverter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Context information required for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換所需的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Cultural information to respect during conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換期間應遵守的文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: Object being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 正在評估以進行轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: A new object based on value.
trans-unit.target: A new object based on value.

trans-unit.source: Converts an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> to a supported destination type.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>成支援的目的地類型。

trans-unit.target: 轉換所需的內容資訊。

trans-unit.target: 正在評估以進行轉換的物件。

trans-unit.target: 正在評估以進行轉換的目的地類型。

trans-unit.source: The only supported destination types are <xref:System.String> and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 唯一支援的目的型別是<xref:System.String>和<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>
